author: newsdesk@derbytelegraph.co.uk (Louis Corbett)
title: Met Office upgrades Derbyshire snow warning and urges people not to drive with up to 7cm possible
text:
An amber weather warning for snow and ice has been issued for the whole of Derbyshire. Most of the North of England is predicted to have heavy snowfall across the weekend. The forecaster has issued the warning for most of Saturday, January 4, and Sunday, January 5.
The warning will come into force at 6 p.m. on Saturday, January 4, and remain in place until midday on Sunday, January 5. The Met Office has warned that the snow and ice will lead to significant travel disruptions across the country and has warned motorists not to travel.
A spokesperson for the Met Office said: "Snow will become persistent and locally heavy as it pushes south to north across the warning area. As well as snow, a period of freezing rain is also likely bringing some hazardous travel conditions before milder air follows across all areas by Sunday morning.
"Whilst there is some uncertainty in details, 3-7 cm of snow is likely for much of the warning area, with locally 15-30 cm for the higher ground of Wales and the southern Pennines. Freezing rain could lead to ice accretion in places, especially parts of Wales, before the milder air leads to a rapid thaw of snow and ice in the south of the warning area through Sunday."
The forecaster has also issued some travel advice for those who are planning to drive this weekend: "It is safer not to drive in these conditions, but if you need to make an essential journey, consider alternative forms of transport to keep you and others safe.
"If you must drive, do this more safely by: using dipped headlights; accelerating gently, using low revs and changing to higher gears as quickly as possible; starting in second gear to help with wheel slip; maintaining a safe and steady speed, keeping distance from other vehicles; using a low gear to go downhill, avoiding braking unless necessary; steering into skids, not taking your hands of the wheel, and avoiding slamming on brakes."
The Met Office has stated that this warning is likely to happen and will have a medium impact as measured on its "impact matrix guide," which allows it to indicate the severity of the warning.

title: A gang that imitated credit score establishments in Leganés falls
text:
After gathering dozens of complaints and months of investigation, the Nationwide Police has dismantled a bunch of cyber criminals, based mostly in a house in Leganés, which operated as a “name middle”. The seven detainees had been credit score establishments, and thru strain and deception they obtained entry information to their account, one thing identified in cybercrime as “vishing”.
There’s a median of financial institution withdrawals ranged from 1,000 to five,000 euros and so they victimized greater than 60 completely different victims, reaching a complete loot of round 100,000 euros. Based on the brokers, the quantity acquired was invested in technological tools, similar to high-end laptops or cellphones, which they later offered.
As Inspector Fandiño defined yesterday, the modus operandi consists of utilizing “spoofing” methods, by which they imitated the communication of the credit score establishment, showing because the caller who saved the sufferer on his cell phone, the place the credit score of the rip-off was maintained.
The Nationwide Police advises that if the sufferer doesn’t reply the decision, the opposite possibility is to hold up and restart the decision, from then they may name the actual quantity they’ve saved within the their telephone e-book. Amongst different measures, they advocate accessing on-line banking to substantiate that the switch is indicated on the telephone, with out accessing it from contacts. In addition they categorical «don’t present private information or passwords or codes acquired by cell phone. Simply as they bear in mind the significance of writing down and saving all the info collected for the preparation of the report and the identification of the criminals concerned later.
“Scammers typically use concern and desperation, making a tough state of affairs “It finally ends up blocking the sufferer and making them extra susceptible.” , provides Fandiño. The same old factor is to obtain a warning message that somebody is making an attempt to entry your account or is referring to a collection of unauthorized expenses. After offering the keys and the faux message, the message would arrive from the verified credit score middle. “However as an alternative of inviting you to cancel the job, the message inspired you to simply accept it. What the victims didn’t learn due to their nerves and the concern of shedding their cash.
However the earlier step concerned social engineering methods, which suggests selecting and discovering victims by social networks. The Nationwide Police ensures that there isn’t any particular sufferer profile, due to this fact, “though we consider that older persons are extra delicate to one of these danger, Any of us could possibly be susceptible and fall into the entice. The ultimate levels of the crime had been to obtain the products obtained. Nonetheless, the leaders of the group often went to 3rd events or tenants, who had been accountable for gathering the cellphones which they’d later promote by casual gross sales platforms.
As quickly because the police unit was capable of establish all of the individuals concerned, the brokers searched the Leganés name middle, the place they discovered a number of telephone playing cards and different units. As well as, 500 grams of marijuana had been seized. Due to this fact, the seven individuals concerned had been arrested as perpetrators of the persevering with crime of pc fraud, falsification of paperwork, cash laundering, use of marital standing, crime towards public well being and membership of a gang felony
Along with the brand new strategies already talked about (vishing spoofing), phishing (e-mail) and smishing (SMS) are nonetheless in impact. The Nationwide Police warn that banks and insurers should not often answerable for one of these rip-off if the entry codes have been offered. As if that weren’t sufficient, this group introduced yesterday {that a} new cybercrime unit was launched, made up of virtually thirty members from completely different police stations.

author: El Siglo de Torreón
title: 'Estamos hartas de vivir así', dicen vecinas de Matamoros por encharcamientos de agua de drenaje | El Siglo de Torreón
text: Se observan leves encharcamientos, como en la calle Múzquiz y 20 de Noviembre. (MARÍA DE JESÚS VÁZQUEZ) [MARÍA DE JESÚS VÁZQUEZ](https://www.google.com/search?as_sitesearch=elsiglodetorreon.com.mx&q=MARÍA DE JESÚS VÁZQUEZ) Desde que se crearon las colonias Obreras y Francisco I. Madero, del Municipio de Matamoros se tiene el problema de encharcamiento de agua del drenaje, en algunas calles, por lo que algunas vecinas dicen que ya están hartas de vivir así y que administraciones se van y llegan sin que se solucione el problema, incluso dicen que tenía al exalcalde Guillermo del Real una vivienda y reprochan que cuando pudo no hizo nada. El mismo problema prevalece en otros puntos de las colonias Carolinas y José Teddy Ayup y aunque los vecinos del sector manifestaron que se envía al camión Vactor para dezasolve de la red, es solo un “calmante” y durante la temporada de lluvia la situación se torna peor. “Antes ahora hay poquita, siempre se llena toda la cuadra, ayer estaba brotando el agua de la alcantarilla, pero casi siempre se sale de la boca de tormenta, por ahí se regresa y da vuelta toda la manzana, pero vino el camión y por eso ya dejó de brotar, pero tiene uno que estarle a hable y hable pa que lo manden”, dijo un señor que se encontraba frente al Centro Comunitario Jesús Ríos Rueda, de la colonia Teddy Ayup y en encharcamiento se registra principalmente en la esquina de las calles Treviño y Alatorre. De forma sarcástica el hombre dijo; “Y todavía se requiere reelegir el jefe (el alcalde Miguel Ángel Ramírez), ah por que si va y le pregunta que falta, aquí en Matamoros le va a decir que nada”. En la esquina de avenida Treviño y Juan de la Cruz Borrego se juntan las colonias Francisco I. Madero y Obrera y las vecinas manifestaron que desde el jueves brota el agua sucia y pestilente, pero una de ellas manifestó que tenía más de 25 años que llegó a ese sector y siempre han batallado con la red sanitaria, pero la situación es peor durante las lluvias ya que el agua se regresa por los registros de los patios o por los baños y aunque reconocieron que les envían el camión Vactor, no es suficiente, ya el problema vuelve a presentarse. Expresó que las colonias se encuentran en parte baja, por lo que consideran que se les regresa el agua de los sectores cercanos y de la zona centro, incluso la mayoría de los vecinos optó por levantar sus banquetas, aproximadamente 50 centímetros, pero reiteran que si llueve ni eso impide que el agua se meta a sus domicilios. “Pa donde quiera que vaya se va encontrar con que no sirve el drenaje ni el pavimento y hasta ahorita ningún presidente hace nada, mire allá (señala una lujosa vivienda) vivía Memo del Real y ese salón de aquí (en la esquina) es de él, pero ya no viven ahí, nomás vienen a darle sus vueltas a la casa, por que hasta a ellos se les metía el agua y prefirieron irse, pero cuando el estuvo de presidente tampoco hizo nada”. En la colonia Carolinas, al otro extremo de la ciudad, también se observan leves encharcamientos, como en la calle Múzquiz y 20 de Noviembre.
